public class SortedWordList
extends java.util.Vector

Maintains a list of WordCounter objects in alphabetical order.

Version:
1.0
Author:
C. Vickery

Constructor Detail

SortedWordList

public SortedWordList()
Method Detail

addWord

public boolean addWord(java.lang.String theWord)
Adds a word to the list in its proper alphabetic position. If the word is already in the list, add one to its counter instead of adding it to the list again.
Parameters:
theWord - The word to be added.
Returns:
True if the word was added, or false if it was just counted.

wordAt

public java.lang.String wordAt(int i)
Returns the word at position i in the array.
Parameters:
i - The index of the word to return.

counterAt

public int counterAt(int i)
Returns the counter at position i in the array.
Parameters:
i - The index of the counter to return.
